import React from "react"; import Game from "./components/game"; import HowToPlay from "./components/" import "./App.css"; function App() { return (
How to play

Write a 4-digit secret number.

The digits must be all different. If the matching digits are in their right positions, they are "bulls", if in different positions, they are "cows".

Example:
  • Secret number: 4271
  • Your try: 1234

Answer: 1 bull and 2 cows. (The bull is "2", the cows are "4" and "1".)

If you have 4 bulls, you win.

); } export default App;
